title: Finance Minister Sitharaman Meets IMF Chief, Discusses Impact of Geopolitical Situation on Global Growth - News18
content: Finance Minister Sitharaman Meets IMF Chief, Discusses Impact of Geopolitical Situation on Global Growth  News18
description: Sitharaman also appreciated India's help to Sri Lanka in tackling its economic crises and assured that the IMF would continue to actively engage with the island nation
